featured.text: This often 31 their anniversary celebration, for his rose bouquet always came one month late.

definition.zh_def: 玫瑰，一種常見的花卉，通常具有美麗的花朵和刺的莖，象徵愛情和美。
definition.en_def: A rose is a common flowering plant known for its beautiful blooms and thorny stems, often symbolizing love and beauty.
definition.example: She received a bouquet of red roses for her birthday.
